audioText: Le gouvernement tient absolument à maintenir sa position sur cette réforme controversée.
question: What is the government's stance on the controversial reform?
options: It is absolutely determined to maintain its position
It is considering changing its approach
It wants to abandon the reform completely
It is seeking public opinion before deciding
explanation: The text states 'Le gouvernement tient absolument à maintenir sa position sur cette réforme controversée' - The government is absolutely determined to maintain its position on this controversial reform. 'Tient à' means to be determined to or insist on something.
